{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20683v1", "title": "Quantum Computation for Jets in Heavy Ion Collisions", "summary": "Quantum computing has recently emerged as a transformative tool for
investigating the real-time dynamics of jets in heavy-ion collisions, offering
novel approaches to simulate non-equilibrium processes and strongly coupled
phenomena that are challenging for classical methods. Here, I summarize my talk
at Hard Probes 2024 at Nagasaki.", "main_category": "hep-ph", "categories": "hep-ph,nucl-th,quant-ph", "published": "2025-04-29T12:03:04Z"}
